question: Which Indian businessperson has entered the top-10 of Forbes India Rich List 2020 for the first time?
explanation:
As per the Forbes India Rich List 2020 that was released recently, the chairman of Reliance Industries Limited remains the richest Indian for the 13th consecutive year.
His net worth stands at USD 88.7 billion. Mukesh Ambani is followed by Gautam Adani with a net worth of 25.2 billion dollar and Shiv Nadar at 20.4 billion dollar. The new entrant in the top 10 is Cyrus Poonawalla, the Chairman of Serum Institute of India (SII).
